name: pm5.7
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: bitr2i(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)), wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)), wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)), wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)))

body.origin: |- wb(wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)), wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)))

stmt.origin: bibi12i(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2), wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w0, w1))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w1, w0), wo(w0, w1))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w2, w1))

|- wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w2, w1))
|- wb(wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, wb(w0, w2)))

comment: Disjunction distributes over the biconditional. Theorem *5.7 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 125. This theorem is similar to ~ orbidi . (Contributed by Roy F. Longton, 21-Jun-2005.)
